title: Red Hill - Jamie McGuire
description:

For Scarlet, raising her two daughters alone makes fighting for tomorrow an everyday battle. Nathan has a wife, but canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t remember what itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s like to be in love; only his young daughter Zoe makes coming home worthwhile.
